SourceString: Something seems to be happening in the village of Tsuskul.\nLet's go to her elf boys, Shishinota and Konota, in the dining room of\nthe Garden of Learning.

In the village of Tsuskuru, please ask Himea's servant Yonja to
prepare the immortal's elixir to save Himea who has fallen ill!
It seems that the recipe is written in a book on medicine kept at the
Shrine of Wisdom in the West.

Sage's elixir for Himea's servant Yonja! Apparently, the material is
the fossilized worm that <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Kirika Plains has.
Once he has it, he will give it to his girlfriend Akashi in the
boarding house in Tskuru Village.

In the village of Tsuskuru, please make the sage's elixir for Himea's\nservant Yonja! He obtained a fossil of a worm as a material and asked\nAkashi to mix the hermit's elixir. Let's take it to Youngja.

At Yonja's request in the village of Tsuskuru, I prepared the

At that time, he found a mysterious book at the Shrine of Wisdom and
decided to read it in Akashi's room.

In the village of Tsuskuru, Yonja asked me to prepare the immortal's
elixir with Akashi.
At that time, I found a mysterious book at the Shrine of Wisdom that
described the existence of an unknown room during the Age of the Gods.
Shishinota seems to be waiting for you at the dining room in the\nlearning garden of Tsuskuru Village.

Let's look for Shishinota in the learning garden of Tsuskuru Village

At Akashi's suggestion, she decided to visit the Dong family, a family
of architects living in the Dolworm Kingdom.

Let's go look for Shishinota in the mysterious room of the Age of Gods
in Tsuskuru Village!
invited me. A visit to the architect of Dolworm reveals that the
Sakura Room in the staff quarters is the entrance to an underground
labyrinth that leads to the Age of Gods Room. Let's return to the
Garden of Learning and report to her, Shishinota.

of Wakaba's expedition,
Let's go underground exploring the mysterious room, the Age of Gods! I

underground labyrinth was found in the Cherry Blossom Room, a room in

My girlfriend, Hajika-sensei, will also join us in the underground

When we finally arrived at the Age of Gods room in the village of
Tsuskuru, it became clear that
Mr. Hajika was aiming for the forbidden technique of eternal youth.
The shrine maiden Himea chased the beast that had escaped from the Age
of Gods.
It seems that Akashi is waiting for you at the dormitory in the\nlearning garden of Tsukuru Village.

told.

told.
If she goes to her mansion in Himea, she might be able to get some

Shrine Maiden Himea in the learning garden of Tsuskuru Village! I was
told.
She asked Yonja, Himea's servant, about the whereabouts of Himea, and
she told him that
she seemed to have headed to the Windy City of Azuran.

Let's find Akashi
Shrine Maiden Himea in the learning garden of Tsuskuru Village! I was

Himea did not answer her Akashi's questions and she returned to the

It seems that the shrine maiden Himea is waiting for you in the\nvillage of Tsuskuru.

I want the shrine maiden Himea from the village of Tsuskuru to go to
the
World Tree Hill with me! It seems that the hill of the World Tree is
the place where Kohaku, his girlfriend, promised Himea to exchange the

I want the shrine maiden Himea from the village of Tsuskuru to go with
me to the
World Tree Hill! It seems that the hill of the World Tree is the place
where Kohaku, his girlfriend, promised Himea to exchange the cup of
oath.

In the village of Tsuskuru, I was asked by the shrine maiden Himea to
go to the World Tree Hill and have a battle with Kohaku.
Himea performed her wedding ceremony with Kohaku, who had passed away,
and she returned to the village.
Let's go to her mansion in Himea in the village of Tskul.

In the village of Tsuskuru, I was asked by the shrine maiden Himea to
go to World Tree Hill and have a battle with Kohaku.
The shrine maiden Himea performed the wedding ceremony with Kohaku,
who passed away on the hill of the World Tree.
Nebel, an elf girl in the Windy City of Azlan, seems to be troubled.
To Nibel, a girl in the windy city of Azlan,\nGet back the ring that was stolen by the big bird!\nIt seems that she flew to the monster bird forest in Kirika Grassland.

To Nibel, a girl in the windy town of Azlan,
Get back the ring that was stolen by the big bird!
It seems that she flew to the monster bird forest of
Kirika Grassland, which is located northeast of the Azlan region.

At the request of Nibel, a girl from the Windy City of Azlan, I
retrieved the ring at the monster bird's nest.
It seems that Sigurd, a Valhalla warrior who met her there, needs
advice from <pc>.
First, let's go deliver her ring to my girlfriend, Nibel.

At the request of Nibel, a girl from the windy town of Azlan,
delivered the ring she had retrieved at the monster bird's nest. She
met Sigurd, a Valhalla warrior, in the forest.
Enter the special big house in Azlan and head for the room with the
pink door to her right!

I went to retrieve the ring of the girl Nibel, and at the monster
bird's nest, I met Sigurd, a warrior of Valhalla.
Then, she was welcomed into the mansion of the lord of Azlan and into
the hall of Valhalla. <pc> became a warrior of the giants.
It seems that the warrior Sigurd is waiting for you at the Hall of\nValhalla in Azlan, the Windy City.

In the hall of Valhalla in the Windy City of Azlan, I asked the
warrior Sigurd to
go with me to the entertainment island of the giants in order to
search for Thor, the sage of power!
In the hall of Valhalla in the Windy City of Azlan, tell the warrior\nSigurd To search for Thor, the sage of power.\nGo with me to the entertainment island of the giants!

In the Windy City of Azlan, I asked the warrior Sigurd to go with me
to the entertainment island of the giants to find Thor, the sage of
power! When he arrived on Luckland Island, Sigurd told him that he had
immediately found
the sage Thor. Let's find the human lady who had the doll.

I received a request from the warrior Sigurd in the Windy City of
Azlan and came to Luckland Island to search for Thor, the sage of
power.
Ada, the owner of Sage Thor, whom I met in front of the Colosseum,
seems to be willing to trade Sage Thor for the steel sword.

I went to Luckland Island with the warrior Sigurd in search of Thor,
the sage of power.
I gave the steel sword to Ada, the owner of Thor the Wise, whom I met
in front of the Colosseum, and asked her to give Thor the Sage to her.
Let's return to her Valhalla mansion in Azlan, the Windy City.

In search of Thor, the sage of power, I went to Luckland Island with
the warrior Sigurd and received Thor, the sage, from Ada.
In the halls of Valhalla, the sage Thor woke up.
He offered to find the whereabouts of the remaining three wise men.
It seems that the warrior Sigurd is waiting for you at the Hall of\nValhalla in Azlan, the Windy City.

Let's go find the two wise men with the warrior Sigurd in the Windy
City of Azlan! I was told.
According to the divination of the sage Thor, the two wise men are
somewhere in the world.
It seems that he is asleep in a house where orphaned children gather
in the castle town of the pink castle.

In the Windy City of Azlan, I received a request from the warrior
Sigurd and visited the church in the city of
Megistris in search of the two wise men. The owner of one of the two
dolls, Kukuri, seems to want to see him belly dance.
Belly dancing seems to be the special skill of her dancing teacher in
the Ulvea underground ruins.

, he obtained Freya, the Sage of Love, and Baldur, the Sage of Light,

Freya, the sage of love, and Balder, the sage of light, at the church
in the city of Megistris.
The two promised to fight together to restore balance to the world.
It seems that the warrior Sigurd is waiting for you at the Hall of\nValhalla in Azlan, the Windy City.

to reclaim the Battle Maiden of Destiny who is imprisoned in the

to reclaim the Battle Maiden of Destiny who is imprisoned in the

It seems that the warrior Sigurd is waiting for you at the Hall of\nValhalla in Azlan, the Windy City.

In the hall of Valhalla in the Windy City of Azlan, ask the warrior
Sigurd to defeat the demon dragon of destruction, the master of the
underground world of Nibelheim, with you!
It seems that the demonic dragon of destruction is sealed away in the
distortions of the Eternal Forest at the easternmost tip of the
continent of Eltona. Let's head to the place the dolls call He Strain.

At the Hall of Valhalla in the Windy City of Azlan, ask the warrior

It seems that the demonic dragon of destruction is sealed away in the

In the Windy City of Azlan, ask the warrior Sigurd to defeat the demon
dragon of destruction!
, but the true identity of the demon dragon was the monster Pusugon.
Awakened, the Battle Maiden of Destiny rushes in and reveals her past
history, and
the situation calms down and she returns to the Hall of Valhalla.

The balance of the world that the warriors of the Hall of Valhalla in
Azlan, the Windy City, desired was the composition of the dolls.
However, his efforts did not reach the heart of
Fura, the mediator Odin, and the world of dolls was shrouded in
darkness.
King Nikoloi seems to be in trouble at Kamiharmy Castle.

At Kamiharmy Castle, Dr. Hanetsuki will ask you to protect me as I
find out where the demonic miasma is coming from!
It seems like you should go to the cave in the northern part of
Kamiharumui territory.

At Kamiharmy Castle, Dr. Hanetsuki will ask you to escort me as I will

It seems like you should go to the cave in the northern part of

in the Imui underground cavern in the north of Kamiharumui territory.
Dr. Hanetsuki returned to the royal capital with the
boy who appeared from the demon's miasma.

I received a request from Dr. Hanetsuki and defeated the Yamiwarashi
in the Imui underground cavern in the north of Kamiharumui territory.

boy from now on.
Dr. Hanetsuki seems to be in trouble at Kamiharmy Castle.
At Kamiharmy Castle, Dr. Hanetsuki asks you to go with the\nboy and investigate the state of the demonic miasma around the Great\nDark Tree!
At Kamiharmy Castle, Dr. Hanetsuki will ask you to go with the\nboy and investigate the state of the demonic miasma around the Great\nDark Tree!

I received a request from Dr. Hanetsuki at Kamiharmy Castle.
I confirmed that there are more demonic miasma around the Dark Tree.
He found out that the boy was raised by the guardian of the great
tree. Let's report to Dr. Hanetski.

I completed the investigation near the Dark Tree at the request of Dr.
Hanetsuki of Kamiharmy Castle.
The boy who was raised by the guardian of the great tree revealed that
his name was Happa, and decided to live in the doctor's room.
Happa seems to be in trouble at Kamiharmy Castle.

In Dr. Hanetsuki's room in Kamiharumui Castle, Happa will make a meal
for Dr. , so we will take the
Kamitona mushroom that grows in the hole in Kamuira, which is north of
the royal capital of Kamiharumui and west of the northern
Kamiharumui territory. Let's go pick it!

In Dr. Hanetsuki's room in Kamiharumui Castle, Happa will cook a meal
for Dr. , so we will take the
Kamitona mushroom that grows in the hole in Kamuira, which is north of
the royal capital of Kamiharumui and west of the northern

I received a request from Happa at Kamiharumui Castle and went to
Kamuira's Hole and safely obtained the Kamitona Mushroom.
Happa went home a little ahead of him to cook for his Dr. Hanetski.
Let's return to Dr. Hanetski's room.

I received a request from Happa of Kamiharmy Castle and obtained
Kamitona mushrooms. Happa cooked a meal for Dr. Hanetsuki.
The doctor was alarmed by the increase in demonic miasma and went to
report the matter to the king.
Let's go to the king's room and testify to the increase in demonic
miasma.

I received a request from Happa at Kamiharmy Castle and obtained the
Kamitona Mushroom. <pc> went to the king's room and reported to the
king that a demon had appeared in Kamuyra's hole. He was called by the
doctor, so he went back to Dr. Hanetzki's room.

I gathered Kamitona mushrooms at the request of Happa of Kamiharmy
Castle. The number of demonic miasma continues to increase, and as his
countermeasure,
King Nikoloi seems to be planning a large-scale operation.
Happa seems to be in trouble at Kamiharmy Castle.
In Dr. Hanetsuki's room in Kamiharmy Castle, Happa says\nI'm going to stop the fight between the elves and the guardian of the\ntree, so please take me to the Dark Tree!
In Dr. Hanetsuki's room in Kamiharmy Castle, Happa says\nI'm going to stop the fight between the elves and the guardian of the\ntree, so please take me to the Dark Tree!

At Kamiharmui Castle, I received a request from Happa and went to the
Dark Tree and defeated the Mashou-Os that appeared from the demon
miasma.
The true identity of the Great Dark Tree was revealed to be the World
Tree, and
the king's army was withdrawn. Let him return to Dr. Hanetzki's room.

At Kamiharmui Castle, I received a request from Happa and went to the
Dark Tree and defeated the Mashouu-o-tachi that appeared from the
demon miasma.
The true identity of the Great Dark Tree is revealed to be the World
Tree, and Dr. Hanetsuki is trying to find a way to eliminate the
magic miasma that covers its core.
Happa seems to be in trouble at Kamiharmy Castle.
In Dr. Hanetsuki's room in Kamiharmy Castle, from Happa\nI'm going to the Imui underground cavern in the north of Kamiharmy\nterritory, so come with me!

In Dr. Hanetsuki's room in Kamiharmy Castle, from Happa
I'm going to the Imui underground cavern in the north of Kamiharmy
territory, so come with me!
Happa seems to feel like he is being called from that place.

In the Imui underground cave in the north of Kamiharumui territory,
Dr. Hanetsuki will
protect me as I am heading to the holy land to instill the power of
the holy land in Happa! I was told. It looks like you should go east
through the Dream Forest and head to the fountain in the royal garden
behind the abandoned castle.

Happa succeeded in imbuing his body with the power of the sacred place
and headed to the Great Dark Tree to erase the makoma.
He was told by Dr. Hanetsuki to also come to the Great Dark Tree in
case <pc> should a monster appear from the demon miasma.

I went to the Great Dark Tree and defeated the
Demonic Dragon that appeared from the demonic miasma that covered the
core, allowing me to get closer to the core.
Happa successfully destroyed the dark demonic miasma that covered the
core and protected the Great Dark Tree.
It seems that he will continue to protect the Great Dark Tree from now
on.
In Leen Village, Chief Setorii's daughter, Rubecca, seems to be\nworried about something.
In Leen Village, Rubecca wanted me to gather all the clues on the\nDahlia case at the time of the incident. She asked me to interview\nChief Setorii.
In Leen Village, Rubecca wanted me to gather all the clues on the\nDahlia case at the time of the incident. She asked me to interview\nChief Setorii.
Rubecca thinks that the clue to the Dahlia case is the old village\ncensus that was apparently thrown away by Hyuza, and she wants me to\ninvestigate inside the Forgotten Cave in Leenham Fields!
Following up on Rubecca's clue about the Dahlia case, I defeated the\nAncient Lickspittles in the Forgotten Cave of Leenam Fields and\nobtained the Old Village Census. Let's deliver it to Rubecca.
In the cave, I obtained the old village census which had a clue:\nthe name of a 10-year-old girl that had been erased. Rubecca told me\nthat we would continue another time and gave me a reward.
In Leen Village, Girl Detective Rubecca seems to be waiting for her\nsidekick's return.
In Leen Village, Girl Detective Rubecca wants start investigating\nagain and asked that I be her sidekick!
Girl Detective Rubecca asked that I become her sidekick in pursuing\nthe truth of the Dahlia case and wants me to focus on asking the\nelders about the ominous lullaby passed down in the village!
The poet who wrote Barbasa's lullaby seems to have headed to the town\nof Julet in search of new ideas for a song. Rubecca wants me to ask\nthe elders in Julet about the poet!
The poet who wrote Barbasa's lullaby seems to have forgot the notebook\nin which he wrote the ideas in Julet town. The notebook should be at\nthe church, inside a wardrobe.

The poet's notebook that I obtained in Julet described an incident in
which a villager died due to a girl's deadly words. Rubecca confessed
that she heard the same voice inside her head and finished up the
investigation.
In Leen Village, Girl Detective Rubecca seems to be waiting for her\nsidekick's return.
In Leen Village, Girl Detective Rubecca wants to investigate the girl\nwho used the death language and asked me to be her sidekick!

Rubecca suspects that the girl who uses the death language and the
girl
whose name was erased from the village census are the same person.
Rubecca asked me to get info about the circumstances surrounding
Dahlia's wedding at the church!
At the church, Father Raja told us that the girl who invoked Dahlia's\ndeath was imprisoned in a cave by angry villagers. Rubecca asked to go\ntogether to Beach Cave in Colt Region!

In Colt Region's Beach Cave, I defeated the Marrow Escapee living in
the chamber where the girl was imprisoned that we investigated.
Rubecca heard the girl's voice in the chamber, and said that she was
too tired to continue.
In Leen Village, Girl Detective Rubecca seems to be waiting for her\nsidekick's return.
In Leen Village, Girl Detective Rubecca would like me to go with her\nto the village orphanage as her sidekick! It seems she'd wants to ask\nBalcha, who built the orphanage, a lot of questions.
In Leen Village, Girl Detective Rubecca would like me to go with her\nto the village orphanage as her sidekick! It seems she'd wants to ask\nBalcha, who built the orphanage, a lot of questions.

After interviewing Balcha, we learned that Fiya, the girl who used the\ndeath language's body was taken by a priest from Prayer Inn. Rubecca\nwants to learn about Fiya and asked me to go to Prayer Inn!
At Prayer Inn, by interviewing Priest Lileigh, I obtained the Priest's\nLocked Diary. Rubecca asked me to get back the Priest's Keyring from a\n<%sEV_QUE_NAME0> in Juleria Underground Mine!
To get back the Priest's Diary's key, I headed towards Juleria\nUnderground Mine to defeat a <%sEV_QUE_NAME0> and obtained the\nPriest's Keyring. Let's go show it to Rubecca.

From the priest's diary, we learned that the priest at the Prayer Inn
was trying to hide Fiya while she was still alive in order to save her.
When Fiya called out Rubecca's name, Rubecca became fearful of her
death and the ended the investigation.
In Leen Village, Rubecca seems to be waiting for help to arrive.
In Leen Village, Rubecca asked me to go with her to Dolroy Falls,\nwhere Fiya met her end! Dolroy Falls seems to be in Booner Rainforest.
In Leen Village, Rubecca asked me to go with her to Dolroy Falls,\nwhere Fiya met her end! Dolroy Falls seems to be in Booner Rainforest.\nRubecca appears to want to go upstream of the waterfall.
In Dolroy Falls, Fiya's ghost materialized and we learned that Fiya's\npower was not causing death, but fortelling it. Rubecca asked that I\ntake her the cave north of Booner Rainforest!

In Booner Rock Cave that Fiya told us of, I defeated Naluviathan, the
true culprit who sank Dahlia into the sea. Rubecca listened to Fiya's
wish about wanting to meet with Reg and Dahlia, and asked me to track
down where we could!

After hearing Fiya's wish, we went to Solace Beach's cenotaph, where
Fiya ascended to heaven while Reg and Dahlia were waiting. Rubecca
declared that the Dahlia case has been solved and took down the
